ED_Title: Strengthening the role of mediation in the peaceful settlement of disputes, conflict prevention and resolution
ED_DecisionText: At its 107th plenary meeting, on 16 September 2019, the General Assembly decided to defer consideration of the sub-item entitled “Strengthening the role of mediation in the peaceful settlement of disputes, conflict prevention and resolution” of the agenda item entitled “Prevention of armed conflict” and to include it in the draft agenda of its seventy-fourth session.
ED_Disclaimer: The final version of decisions adopted during the resumed part of the session will be contained in the official record of the GA (A/73/49 (Vol. III) after editorial review.
